programme.title: Daft Punk Unchained
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the pop culture phenomenon of the mysterious music duo Daft Punk, which pulls back the masks of the Grammy award winning French musicians, who are famed for performing in robot attire that hides their faces. Includes radio interviews, rare footage and exclusive interviews with their close friends and collaborators

programme.title: Kobe Bryant's Muse
programme.desc: Documentary that goes behind the stats to reveal the story of Kobe Bryant's career, exploring the mentorships, allies and rivalries that have helped shape his stellar 18-year tenure in the NBA, and offering access to his daily experiences, his lifelong inspirations and the battle with his greatest personal challenge yet

programme.title: Ping Pong Summer
programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong

programme.title: St. Vincent
programme.desc: A quirky comedy starring Bill Murray as a hedonistic war veteran, with a penchant for alcohol and gambling, who is entrusted with babysitting the 12-year-old boy next door. As the improbable pair develops a friendship both of them learn to grow up, in unexpected ways. Also stars Melissa McCarthy and Naomi Watts

programme.title: Tart
programme.desc: A spoiled New York City high school student (Dominique Swain) experiments with sex, drugs and murder at a luxurious country estate, along with her rich friends and the boy (Brad Renfro) of her fantasies in this stark coming-of-age drama costarring Bijou Phillips and Mischa Barton

programme.title: Girl on the Edge
programme.desc: A troubled teenager who falls victim to an online predator is sent to an experimental treatment center to recover from the trauma, where she fights the demons of the past with the help of her new friends and a rescued horse

programme.title: Intruders
programme.desc: An agoraphobic woman is isolated from human contact in every way and that is exactly how she likes it. But when a trio of criminals breaks into her old Victorian house on the outskirts of town, they discover there's another side to her psychosis

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: Ten killers sentenced to death for their murderous crimes are flown to a remote island and pitted against each other in a lethal series of fights, with the ultimate victor winning his freedom as the grand prize. Steve Austin, Vinnie Jones, Robert Mammone and Rick Hoffman star in this bone-cracking, hard-driving action thriller

programme.title: Paranoia
programme.desc: When a rising star in the global tech company makes an innocent mistake, he must become a corporate spy to obtain trade secrets from a rival company. But what starts as a clever ruse becomes a life-and-death game of corporate espionage. Stars Liam Hemsworth, Harrison Ford and Gary Oldman

programme.title: St. Vincent

programme.title: Good Luck Chuck
programme.desc: A dentist (Dane Cook) who is also a lifelong bachelor suddenly realizes at an ex-girlfriend's wedding that every woman he's ever slept with has found her true love with the very next man she dated - making him instant catnip to ladies only interested in benefiting from his "curse." Jessica Alba and Dan Fogler costar in this romantic comedy

programme.title: Brad Williams: Daddy Issues
programme.desc: In this hilarious new comedy special, stand-up Brad Williams tackles race and political correctness, as well as how his father raised him to deal with adversity

programme.title: The Day
programme.desc: A group of people working to stay alive in a post-apocalyptic future discover what they think is a safe, abandoned farmhouse, but they soon find themselves fighting to stay alive as a gang of bloodthirsty predators attack

Among the racers: a narcoleptic Italian (Rowan Atkinson), an uptight politician (Breckin Meyer), a daredevil pilot (Amy Smart), a just-reunited mother and daughter (Whoopi Goldberg and Lanei Chapman), a greedy family man (Jon Lovitz), dimwitted brothers (Seth Green and Vince Vieluf), and a disgraced NFL ref (Cuba Gooding Jr.)

programme.title: Atari: Game Over
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the rise, fall and burial of the Atari Corporation told through the lens of the filmmakers unearthing hundred of thousands of unsold "E.T." game cartridges that were buried in a small town of New Mexico

programme.title: Underclassman
programme.desc: A young detective goes undercover at an elite private school to destroy an international stolen car ring

programme.title: The Honeymooners
programme.desc: This modern-day update of the classic television series stars Cedric the Entertainer as New York City bus driver Ralph Kramden, whose get-rich-quick schemes with sewer worker buddy Ed Norton (Mike Epps), including training a stray mutt as a racing dog, threaten to drive their long-suffering wives Alice (Gabrielle Union) and Trixie (Regina Hall) to take drastic action. Eric Stoltz costars with John Leguizamo in this infectiously funny adaptation

programme.title: Rat Race
programme.desc: An eccentric casino owner (John Cleese) pits six teams against each other in a dash across the desert to a locker stuffed with $2 million in this madcap comedy. Among the racers: a narcoleptic Italian (Rowan Atkinson), an uptight politician (Breckin Meyer), a daredevil pilot (Amy Smart), a just-reunited mother and daughter (Whoopi Goldberg and Lanei Chapman), a greedy family man (Jon Lovitz), dimwitted brothers (Seth Green and Vince Vieluf), and a disgraced NFL ref (Cuba Gooding Jr.)

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin
programme.desc: Epic fantasy-adventure tale set in Britain's Dark Ages where a banished warrior and a hermit wizard embark on a heroic quest to defeat a powerful druid and save their people

programme.title: Underclassman
programme.desc: A young detective goes undercover at an elite private school to destroy an international stolen car ring

programme.title: Whiskers
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Jed (Michael Caloz) arranges for the Egyptian goddess of felines to turn his cuddly cat into a kid. However, since cat years and human years figure differently, "Whiskers" is now a thirty-year-old man. Jacob Tierney costars in this cat comedy

programme.title: Against the Tide
programme.desc: A Showtime Sports chronicle of the seminal 1970 college football matchup between Alabama's Crimson Tide and USC Trojans at Birmingham's Legion Field. Through interviews with former Alabama legends Joe Namath, John Mitchell and USC stars Sam "Bam" Cunningham, Jimmy Jones and more, this documentary examines coach Paul "Bear" Bryant's surprising decision to bring a dominant, racially integrated football team onto the field in Birmingham for the very first time and reveals the impact college football played in the struggle for integration

programme.title: Molly Moon and the Incredible Book of Hypnotism
programme.desc: A young orphan girl, Molly Moon, learns hypnotism from a book, catapulting her to fame and wealth in London. But little does she know that there's an unscrupulous bank robber who'll stop at nothing to get her book

programme.title: Street Dance Family
programme.desc: Documentary following Entity - one of UK's most successful and controversial under sixteen street dance crew - who battle to overcome the challenges that face them in their bid for glory on the world stage. Features fly-on-the-wall footage from the training room to international competitions and examines the lives of the trainers, the kids and their families as they compete for the World Championship

programme.title: The One I Wrote For You
programme.desc: A singer/songwriter (Cheyenne Jackson) who walked away from a chance at stardom a decade ago enters a reality TV show contest and finds himself once again drawn into the intoxicating world of fame and fortune. As a semi-finalist, he transforms into an audience favorite - but in his rise to the top, will he forget what matters most?

programme.title: The Accidental Spy
programme.desc: Jackie Chan stars in this globe-trotting adventure as a sporting goods salesman whose dream of being an international spy comes true when he foils a bank robbery and is recruited to search for a missing person in Korea, where he uncovers a plot involving a hidden fortune and a stolen weapon of mass destruction. Eric Tsang and Vivian Hsu costar

programme.title: Molly Moon and the Incredible Book of Hypnotism
programme.desc: A young orphan girl, Molly Moon, learns hypnotism from a book, catapulting her to fame and wealth in London. But little does she know that there's an unscrupulous bank robber who'll stop at nothing to get her book

programme.title: Wish You Well
programme.desc: When a tragic accident forces a 12-year-old girl and her younger brother to move from New York City to live with their great grandmother on a small farm in Virginia, their new life is threatened by a coal company trying to steal their land. Stars Ellen Burstyn

programme.title: The One I Wrote For You
programme.desc: A singer/songwriter (Cheyenne Jackson) who walked away from a chance at stardom a decade ago enters a reality TV show contest and finds himself once again drawn into the intoxicating world of fame and fortune. As a semi-finalist, he transforms into an audience favorite - but in his rise to the top, will he forget what matters most?

programme.title: What Women Want
programme.desc: Electrocuted in a hairdryer mishap, womanizing ad exec Nick Marshall (Mel Gibson) is suddenly able to hear the thoughts of the opposite sex. At first, Nick thinks he's been given a terrific advantage in the bedroom and the boardroom, but soon his psychic gift turns the once-clueless Nick into a better father, employee and man, a transformation that does not go unnoticed by his beautiful boss Darcy (Helen Hunt). Alan Alda, Marisa Tomei, Lauren Holly, Ashley Johnson and Mark Feuerstein costar in this comedy blockbuster(n)

programme.title: Only You (1992)
programme.desc: This romantic comedy stars Andrew McCarthy as Clifford, a loser who is dumped by his fiancee on the eve of a pre-wedding vacation to Mexico. His tickets are nonrefundable, so he invites the sexy Amanda (Kelly Preston), whom he meets in a bar, to accompany him on the trip. But while Amanda plays sexual head games with Clifford and ruins his getaway, he falls for the beautiful travel agent (Helen Hunt) who set him up on the trip in the first place. Daniel Roebuck and Joel Murray co-star in the directing debut of Betty Thomas ("Dr. Dolittle")(n)

programme.title: Sister
programme.desc: After the death of his father, a young man whose life is falling apart, returns to his hometown to take care of his mentally ill sister, and tries to save her, while also saving himself(n)

programme.title: The Last Keepers
programme.desc: Zosia Mamet stars as a teenage girl who learns that she descends from a long line of powerful witches and strives to embrace her true destiny in this fantasy drama(n)

programme.title: The Accidental Spy
programme.desc: Jackie Chan stars in this globe-trotting adventure as a sporting goods salesman whose dream of being an international spy comes true when he foils a bank robbery and is recruited to search for a missing person in Korea, where he uncovers a plot involving a hidden fortune and a stolen weapon of mass destruction. Eric Tsang and Vivian Hsu costar(n)

programme.title: Dean Smith
programme.desc: Coach, mentor, social activist ...the life and legacy of Dean Smith, North Carolina's legendary basketball coach - who went to 11 Finals Fours and won two National Championships, with players like Michael Jordan, James Worthy, Vince Carter and Jerry Stackhouse - is remembered and celebrated by former players and colleagues(n)

programme.title: Ronnie & Julie
programme.desc: Teenagers who meet thanks to a mutual interest in ice-skating (he's a hockey player, she's a figure skater) proceed to fall head over heels in love, jeopardizing a local election for their rival political families. Joshua Jackson and Margot Finlay star with Teri Garr and Alexandra Purvis in this contemporary reworking of Shakespeare's "Romeo and Juliet."(n)

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world(n)

programme.title: Becoming Bulletproof
programme.desc: Documentary following the making of a rip-roaring Western costume drama featuring a diverse group of disabled people from across the US, which tells a moving story of big screen barriers and raises questions about why we so rarely see disabled actors on film(n)

programme.title: Rocky Balboa
programme.desc: When a cable channel runs a computer boxing simulation that predicts an in-his-prime Rocky Balboa would win a fight against the current heavyweight champion, the aging, retired Balboa - now a widowed Philadelphia restaurant owner - begins considering a very late-career comeback. Sylvester Stallone stars in, writes, and directs this charming final installment in the "Rocky" saga, costarring Milo Ventimiglia, Geraldine Hughes, Burt Young and Antonio Tarver(n)

programme.title: Life of a King
programme.desc: Based on an inspiring true story, Academy Award� winner Cuba Gooding Jr. stars as a man released from prison after 18 years, who starts a chess club to keep inner-city youth from the streets and give them what he never had: a future(n)

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world(n)

programme.title: Hidalgo
programme.desc: Based on the true story of the greatest long-distance horse race ever run, this epic action-adventure set in 1890 follows a down-and-out cowboy who travels to Arabia to compete in a deadly cross-desert horse race. Stars Viggo Mortensen and Omar Sharif(n)

programme.title: Woman in Gold
programme.desc: Sixty years after fleeing Vienna, an elderly Jewish woman (Helen Mirren) attempts to reclaim family possessions that were seized by the Nazis. Among them is a famous portrait of her beloved aunt, painted by Gustav Klimt. With the help of a young lawyer she embarks upon a lengthy legal battle to recover what rightfully belongs to her family

programme.title: Blue Velvet
programme.desc: Kyle MacLachlan stars as a college student who returns home after his father has a stroke and discovers a severed ear in an abandoned field. When he attempts to find out what has happened, he is drawn into a dark, depraved and mysterious world. David Lynch directs. Co-stars Isabella Rossellini, Dennis Hopper and Laura Dern

programme.title: What If
programme.desc: Comedy starring Daniel Radcliffe as a med school dropout who can't keep his love life in order or keep it separate from a new friendship with a woman who, inconveniently, has a boyfriend. Also stars Zoe Kazan and Adam Driver

programme.title: L Word Mississippi: Hate The Sin
programme.desc: A provocative and moving documentary that explores the lives of gay women living in the conservative, religious deep South and the unique hardships, bigotry, bullying, sexism and racism they endure. Produced by Ilene Chaiken of 'The L Word' and 'The Real L Word'

programme.title: Da Sweet Blood of Jesus
programme.desc: In this stylized Spike Lee thriller, a man cursed by a mysterious ancient African artifact is overwhelmed by a newfound thirst for blood, which leads him into a dangerous romance that calls into question the very nature of love, addiction, sex and status

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments

programme.title: Only You (1992)

programme.desc: Liv Tyler and Ben Affleck star in this romantic comedy about a music promoter whose career is sidelined by an unexpected tragedy and a personal blowup, leaving him to take care of his precocious daughter. Also stars Jennifer Lopez, Will Smith and Jason Biggs

programme.title: The Lovers
programme.desc: After a dangerous dive into the wreckage of a British merchant ship to save his wife, a marine biologist falls into a coma that transports us back in time to India in 1788, where a young British captain falls for an Indian woman, in this tale of two centuries, two continents and star-crossed lovers linked together by a powerful ring. Stars Josh Hartnett

Stars Cate Blanchett and Rooney Mara

programme.title: Winter Passing
programme.desc: In this dramatic comedy, Zooey Deschanel stars as a struggling twenty-something actress who goes in search of her legendary, reclusive novelist father and must wrestle with his unconventional new family and their shared past. Also stars Ed Harris and Will Ferrell

programme.title: Body
programme.desc: After three twenty-something girls break into a mansion and inadvertently murder the groundskeeper, they slowly self-destruct as they decide what to do with the dead body in the living room

programme.title: The Caretaker
programme.desc: When a young woman moves into a large Victorian home to become the caretaker to her aging, sickly grandmother, she soon finds herself sleepwalking and having strange visions and is forced to confront her family's darkest secrets before the evil presence in the house overtakes her sanity

programme.title: All-Stars
programme.desc: Comedy about a veteran softball coach, who is saddled with a team of inexperienced 10-year-old girls and their overly ambitious, delusional parents

programme.desc: Oscar winner� Anne Hathaway stars as a woman whose musician brother is left in a coma following a car accident, leading her to seek out his idols and finding herself falling for an unlikely match in this romantic drama set against the backdrop of Brooklyn's vibrant indie music scene(n)

programme.title: Walking on Sunshine
programme.desc: Love, sun, lust and 80s hit songs collide in this musical romantic comedy set on the stunning coast of Italy, where a young woman is on the precipice of marrying her gorgeous fianc�, not knowing he had a fling with her sister(n)

programme.title: Calendar Girls
programme.desc: Comedy based on the true story of a women''s group in a small English town who choose to upend the traditional order by posing nude for their annual charity calendar. Stars Helen Mirren and Julie Walters(n)

programme.title: Match
programme.desc: Patrick Stewart stars as a master dance teacher and choreographer with a lifetime of memories, who is interviewed by a young couple and unexpectedly forced to confront the painful decisions he thought he left in the past(n)

programme.title: Woman in Gold

With the help of a young lawyer she embarks upon a lengthy legal battle to recover what rightfully belongs to her family(n)

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: This classic holiday romantic comedy interweaves the stories of nine contemporary Londoners, from the handsome bachelor Prime Minister who falls for a junior staffer to a schoolboy with a crush, as they wrestle with the funny, poignant and often silly side of love. Stars Laura Linney, Hugh Grant, Emma Thompson, Colin Firth and Alan Rickman(n)

programme.title: Calendar Girls
programme.desc: Comedy based on the true story of a women''s group in a small English town who choose to upend the traditional order by posing nude for their annual charity calendar. Stars Helen Mirren and Julie Walters(n)

programme.title: Cool Hand Luke
programme.desc: Best Actor nominee Paul Newman gives one of the best performances of his career in this prison drama about a defiant loner doing time in a Southern penal camp, where escape is futile and punishment sadistic. George Kennedy won a Best Supporting Actor Oscar as the convict leader Dragline, and Strother Martin is excellent as the prison official who can't abide a "failure to communicate

programme.title: Two Girls and a Sailor
programme.desc: Two sisters stage USO shows in their apartment to entertain visiting servicemen until a wealthy GI turns a warehouse into a canteen, where the stars come out to shine and the sisters vie for the same guy

programme.title: Sense and Sensibility
programme.desc: Oscar-nominated adaptation of Jane Austen's novel about the still-single Dashwood sisters and how they cope with men, marriage and money after their father dies. The screenplay (written by star Emma Thompson) was the sole Oscar winner out of seven nominations

programme.title: The Miracle Worker
programme.desc: A visually-challenged teacher educates a blind and deaf girl, teaching her sign language while fending off her overprotective parents. (cc)

programme.title: West Side Story
programme.desc: Rival New York street gangs war in Manhattan over turf boundaries while two youths fall in love, but they are from opposing groups. (cc)

programme.title: Night into Morning
programme.desc: Story of a professor (Ray Milland) trying to adjust to the tragic deaths of his wife and son. Tom: John Hodiak. Katherine: Nancy Davis. Snyder: Lewis Stone. Dotty: Dawn Addams. Girl: Jean Hagen. Excellent dramatic fare with fine performances. Fletcher Markle directed

programme.title: The Time Machine
programme.desc: In 1899, a young scientist completes the construction of his time-travel machine and thrusts himself into the 20th century, witnessing the wars that took place before launching himself ahead to a distant year where humankind is not at all like it was

programme.title: When Ladies Meet
programme.desc: Wife (Ann Harding) vs. mistress (Myrna Loy) in a witty, sophisticated conversation piece that discusses men, marriage and morals in an adult and civilized manner. Alice Brady, Robert Montgomery. Rogers: Frank Morgan. Walter: Martin Burton. Fine performances, sparkling dialogue, slick production. Harry Beaumont directed

programme.title: The Rains Came
programme.desc: India's torrential rains background the romance of a straying wife (Myrna Loy) and a Hindu physician (Tyrone Power) in this impressive version of the novel by Louis Bromfield. Tom: George Brent. Fern: Brenda Joyce. Esketh: Nigel Bruce. Phoebe: Jane Darwell. Maharani: Maria Ouspenskaya. Mrs. Simon: Marjorie Rambeau. Maharajah: H.B. Warner. Lily: Laura Hope Crews. Miss MacDaid: Mary Nash. Smiley: Henry Travers. Directed by Clarence Brown

programme.title: So Goes My Love
programme.desc: The family life of inventor Hiram Maxim

programme.title: The Bachelor and the Bobby-Soxer
programme.desc: A judge decides that the best way to curb the excesses of a playboy art teacher is to force him to do what he does best--romance a willing young lady, who happens to be the judge's teenage sister and who comes with a hand's-off order. Sidney Sheldon's script won an Oscar for Best Original Screenplay

programme.title: Mr. Blandings Builds His Dream House
programme.desc: Manhattan marrieds "trade city soot for sylvan charm" when they move to the Connecticut suburbs, where they experience an endless succession of construction nightmares and fiascoes and their new place turns into a money pit

programme.title: Midnight Lace
programme.desc: Suspense yarn about an heiress (Doris Day) terrified by death threats. Rex Harrison, John Gavin, Myrna Loy, Roddy McDowall, Natasha Parry. Manning: Herbert Marshall. Dora: Hermione Baddeley. Nora: Doris Lloyd. Directed by David Miller

programme.title: The Ambassador's Daughter
programme.desc: The daughter of an American politician assigned to France sets out to prove that Paris should not be declared off-limits to U.S. military personnel, especially after she falls in love with one

programme.title: Lonelyhearts
programme.desc: An out-of-work journalist lands a job as an advice columnist and proceeds to get too caught up in his readers' problems

programme.title: Myrna Loy So Nice to Come Home To
programme.desc: Kathleen Turner hosts a retrospective on the actress's career that features clips from "The Thin Man" (1934) and the Oscar-winning "The Best Years of Our Lives" (1946). Also: a look at Loy's beginnings as a chorus-line dancer and her work for the Red Cross during WWII. (cc)

programme.title: Design for Living
programme.desc: Noel Coward's romantic triangle, set in Paris, involves an attractive woman and two best friends, one a bad artist and the other a not-much-better playwright

programme.title: The Love Parade
programme.desc: A count romances a queen who is required to take a husband and enters into a "marriage of state," but chafes at the idea of being a mere consort and not having anything to do with running the country. A Best Picture nominee that was Ernst Lubitsch's first talkie and earned him a Best Director nod

programme.title: Robin and Marian
programme.desc: After 20 years gone from England, a middle-aged Robin Hood returns and resparks his relationship with Maid Marian (who's spent the years as a nun), reconnects with his Merry Men and renews his feud with the villainous Sheriff of Nottingham

programme.title: Frenchman's Creek
programme.desc: A bored Englishwoman finds adventure and romance with a dashing pirate. An adaptation of the Daphne du Maurier novel

programme.title: Hot Shots
programme.desc: Two of the Bowery Boys (Huntz Hall, Stanley Clements) become involved with an 8-year-old TV star (Phil Phillips). Joi Lansing, Mark Dana, Robert Shayne, David Condon, Queenie Smith. Thin. Directed by Jean Yarbrough

programme.title: Lawrence of Arabia
programme.desc: David Lean's epic Best Picture about British Army lieutenant T.E. Lawrence, who galvanized the Arab revolt against the Turks in World War I, endured indignities from his Turkish captors and eventually led his forces to a number of smashing victories. The film won a total of seven Academy Awards, including director, cinematography, editing and score

programme.title: Some Like It Hot
programme.desc: Two male musicians go on the lam posing as women in an all-girl orchestra after witnessing a gangland massacre in 1929 Chicago

programme.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
programme.desc: Washington, D.C., is visited by a pacifist outer-space alien and his impressive robot who demand the human race end aggression and warfare

programme.title: That's Entertainment
programme.desc: Video scrapbook showcases classic musical numbers from nearly 70 MGM musicals. (cc)(n)

programme.title: That's Entertainment, Part 2
programme.desc: Fred Astaire and Gene Kelly are hosts for this second star-studded salute to MGM's film classics, with the emphasis on musicals(n)

programme.title: That's Entertainment! III
programme.desc: Outtakes from MGM musicals highlight this anthology, including never-before-seen clips of Judy Garland, Fred Astaire, Cyd Charisse, Lena Horne, Debbie Reynolds and Eleanor Powell. On-screen hosts include Gene Kelly and Lena Horne. (cc)(n)

programme.title: That's Dancing!
programme.desc: A toe-tapping relation to "That's Entertainment!" that consists of dance sequences from the '20s through the '80s. Narrators: Gene Kelly, Sammy Davis Jr., Mikhail Baryshnikov, Liza Minnelli and Ray Bolger(n)

programme.title: Rope
programme.desc: Two college friends commit a murder, then serve up clues about their deadly deed at a dinner party. Alfred Hitchcock directed(n)

programme.title: Strangers on a Train
programme.desc: Alfred Hitchcock's masterful suspense tale of a tennis pro railroaded into a murder pact by a demented playboy, who offers to kill the athlete's unfaithful wife in exchange for him doing away with the rich man's hated father. Raymond Chandler cowrote the script based on Patricia Highsmith's novel. Hitchcock's daughter, Patricia Hitchcock, costars as Barbara Morton, sister of the tennis player's girlfriend(n)

programme.title: Torn Curtain

programme.desc: Lame spy spoof with Cedric the Entertainer as an amnesiac who gets mixed up with secret agents and a high-level conspiracy. Lucy Liu, Nicollette Sheridan, Mark Dacascos, Callum Keith Rennie. Directed by Les Mayfield. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Matchstick Men
programme.desc: A con artist's psychological problems are compounded when he meets the daughter he has never known. Reluctant to develop his role as a father, the neurotic hustler gets heavily involved in his scheming partner's ambitious swindle. (cc)(n)

programme.title: National Lampoon's Van Wilder
programme.desc: A seven-year college senior hatches an enterprising plan to stay in school after his rich father cuts off his tuition payments. He also tries to charm a student journalist who's out to expose his rowdy antics(n)

programme.title: Rocket Science
programme.desc: Rewarding coming-of-age saga of a stuttering teen (Reece Daniel Thompson) who joins his high-school debate squad and falls in love with a female teammate (Anna Kendrick). Written and directed by Jeffrey Blitz. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: A highly decorated 30-year Marine veteran (Samuel L. Jackson) is put on trial for a rescue mission that went wrong. Good performances, but plot holes abound.Tommy Lee Jones. Directed by William Friedkin. (cc)(n)

programme.title: I Now Pronounce You Chuck & Larry

Historical saga, set in 480 B.C., about a Spartan king leading 300 warriors against an overwhelming force of Persian invaders. The film is based on Frank Miller's graphic novel "300." (cc)(n)

programme.title: Blues Brothers 2000
programme.desc: This sequel to the 1980 comedy "The Blues Brothers" finds brother Elwood released from jail and looking to re-form the band with a burly bartender after the death of brother Jake(n)

programme.title: High Anxiety
programme.desc: A renowned Harvard psychiatrist (with a concealed fear of heights) takes over as director of the PsychoNeurotic Institute for the Very, Very Nervous after the last administrator dies under suspicious circumstances. Mel Brooks directed, co-wrote and plays the head shrink in this homage to Alfred Hitchcock films. (cc)

programme.title: The Princess Diaries
programme.desc: In this modern-day fable, a European queen travels to San Francisco to find her long-lost granddaughter and groom her for the throne. (cc)

programme.title: Vice Special Report A House Divided
programme.desc: An interview with President Barack Obama, who discusses what he's achieved and the divisions that have deepened during his two terms. Also included are remarks by Vice President Joe Biden, Sen. Harry Reid (D-Nev.), former House speaker John Boehner, Rep. Nancy Pelosi (D-Cal.) and pollster Frank Luntz. (cc)

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: In this adventure docudrama set in 1996, several groups of climbers successfully scale Mount Everest, only to be faced with tragedy when a monster snowstorm surprises them as they attempt to make their descent. (cc)

programme.title: Carlito's Way Rise to Power

programme.title: The Wedding Singer
programme.desc: A singer's life is sent into upheaval after being left at the altar, leaving him to try and put the pieces back together with a waitress. (cc)

programme.title: Quedate
programme.desc: A Central American refugee and her child are given shelter by a laborer who provides aid to illegal immigrants. (cc)

programme.title: Life or Something like It
programme.desc: A TV reporter sets out to change her ways after a homeless psychic tells her that she has only a week to live. (cc)

programme.title: No Reservations

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding
programme.desc: The proud Portokalos clan reels from the news that thirtysomething daughter (Nia Vardalos) has fallen for a teacher (John Corbett) who is not Greek. The rare romantic comedy that's actually both romantic and funny. Vardalos earned an Oscar nomination for her screenplay, which is adapted from her one-woman stage show. Michael Constantine and Lainie Kazan are excellent as the bride's parents. Directed by Joel Zwick; Rita Wilson and Tom Hanks are among the producers. (cc)

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: Toula's family throws an even bigger Greek wedding for her parents, who learn they never officially tied the knot. Meanwhile, she tries to spice up her own marriage and deals with a daughter who's eager to escape from her overbearing clan. (cc)

programme.title: The Martian

programme.title: Joy

programme.title: The Man From U.N.C.L.E.

programme.title: Goodfellas
programme.desc: Gangster saga explores the life of organized crime as it chronicles the true-life rise and fall of New York mobster and FBI informant Henry Hill and the more prominent "goodfellas" in his world. Henry comes up through the ranks, but quickly learns that his half-Irish, half-Sicilian ethnicity prevents him from ever becoming a "made guy." Soon he finds himself the target of both the feds and his Mafia family, who feel that he has become a threat to their security with his reckless dealings(n)

programme.title: Kulinarne inspiracje Rachel Khoo: Londyn
programme.sub-title: Kulinarne notatki z podróży Rachel Khoo: Londyn (odc. 9)
programme.desc: Znawczyni gotowania Rachel Khoo powraca w swoje rodzinne strony, do Londynu, w poszukiwaniu kulinarnych inspiracji. Miłośnicy talentu słynnej Brytyjki nie będą zawiedzeni. Podróż po tętniącej życiem brytyjskiej stolicy to zarówno dla prowadzącej, jak i widzów pełne intrygujących doznań, widoków, dźwięków, oraz rzecz jasna smaków, niezapomniane doświadczenie zamknięte w dziesięciu inspirujących odcinkach. Rachel odwiedza urządzoną w prywatnej piwnicy wędzarnię łososi. Gości też w sklepie, w którym można kupić przetwory robione na zamówienie(c)

programme.title: Kulinarne inspiracje Rachel Khoo: Londyn
programme.sub-title: Kulinarne notatki z podróży Rachel Khoo: Londyn (odc. 9)
programme.desc: Znawczyni gotowania Rachel Khoo powraca w swoje rodzinne strony, do Londynu, w poszukiwaniu kulinarnych inspiracji. Miłośnicy talentu słynnej Brytyjki nie będą zawiedzeni. Podróż po tętniącej życiem brytyjskiej stolicy to zarówno dla prowadzącej, jak i widzów pełne intrygujących doznań, widoków, dźwięków, oraz rzecz jasna smaków, niezapomniane doświadczenie zamknięte w dziesięciu inspirujących odcinkach. Rachel odwiedza urządzoną w prywatnej piwnicy wędzarnię łososi. Gości też w sklepie, w którym można kupić przetwory robione na zamówienie(c)

programme.title: Rated A for Awesome
programme.sub-title: Thera's Brother the Car/ET Phone Noam.
programme.desc: Double bill. Les ends up in a body cast which the team awesomises into a racing car. Then, Noam's awesomised guitar attracts alien beings, who invite him to join their galaxy tour.

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.sub-title: Lucius O'Thunderpunch/Bring Me the Head of Ranginald Bagel!.
programme.desc: Double bill. McFist introduces himself as superhero, Lucius O'Thunderpunch. Then, Randy accidentally endangers a kid at school.

programme.title: Wander Over Yonder
programme.desc: Double bill. Wander and Sylvia hide from Dominator's forces with Sylvia's family. Then, when Emperor Awesome shows up on Dominator's ship, Peepers and Hater must figure out if the two are joining forces or dating.

programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost
programme.desc: Double bill. Madame X is no longer interested in capturing Billy, so he goes on a search for a new obsessed fan. Then, Spencer convinces his family to be on a reality show.

programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost
programme.sub-title: A Place in the Sun/Copycat Cobra.
programme.desc: Double bill. Spencer stands up to Lolo and unwittingly becomes the new `king of the school'. Then, another ghost shows up at the mansion to hang out with his idol.

programme.title: Kid vs Kat
programme.desc: Double bill. Dad and Millie play with Dad's collection of vintage board games. Then, Coop is chosen to be the Weiner Water Keeper.

programme.title: Kid vs Kat
programme.desc: Double bill. Coop catches a cold and has to stay at home with Kat, resulting in a fight for territory. Then, Dennis and Coop perform a magic show and make Kat disappear, only to find they cannot make him reappear.

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.sub-title: Randy Cunningham and the Sorcerer's Key/McFear Factor.
programme.desc: Double bill. Randy must stop the Ninja's enemy running amok. Then, Viceroy creates a Robo-Rhino that makes the gang confront what scares them most.

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.desc: When Randy inadvertently mind-wipes himself and develops amnesia, Howard must fill in as the Ninja until Randy can get his memory back.

programme.desc: Family comedy based on the children's novel by David Walliams. Twelve-year-old Chloe leads a lonely existence - her mother is too busy with her political ambitions to take any interest in her daughter, her hen-pecked dad is hiding a secret of his own and she cannot hope to compete with her `perfect' younger sister - to say nothing of the nasty girls who make her school life a misery. So when she meets a tramp in need of somewhere to stay, she invites him to hide in her family's garden shed - but it soon turns out there is more to her smelly guest than meets the eye. Downton Abbey's Hugh Bonneville stars, with Sheridan Smith, Johnny Vegas and Isabella Blake-Thomas, and an appearance from Britain's Got Talent winner Pudsey the dog.

programme.desc: In episode four of Show Me What You're Made Of our teens they leave Cambodia to fly further east to the island of Taiwan. Here they head straight to an enormous tea plantation where they grow the tea for the British export market. It's been a tough trip for our five teens and within minutes of arriving at the tea factory one of them feels unwell. With a man down how will the other four cope with the very physical work involved? Their boss is the strictest one yet and he is not a man to be messed with. At the end of their first shift the boss proves that he is very serious about tea when he sacks one of the team. They may be shocked but can they pull together as a team to turn this situation around? Show Me What You're Made Of is presented by Stacey Dooley.

programme.title: Eve
programme.desc: Eve's attempts to help her sister KT pass for human are derailed when a miraculously recovered Katherine returns to Calimov. To Nick and Eve's horror, Katherine reveals her new range of childbots, which have been placed with local families. To prevent Katherine restoring KT to factory settings, Eve smuggles her out of Calimov and back to the Clarke house. But with Will and Lily insisting KT is returned to Calimov, Eve and her sister are forced to take matters into their own hands. The situation escalates when Katherine's childbots start to malfunction and it is KT who comes under suspicion, admitting she has no wish to pass as human. In order to make Eve prove she loves her sister as she is, KT wants Eve to reveal her own robot identity to the world. Trapped inside the house by the childbots, and with police and reporters gathering outside, the gang's worst fears have been realised. With Eve about to admit her secret to the world on live TV, can Will's nanobots save the day?.(n)

programme.title: Eve
programme.desc: Rebecca and Nick are desperate to get to the bottom of Will's nanobot problem, so they take him into Calimov to run some tests. Whilst there, Nick insists that Katherine deactivate KT after the trouble she has caused, but Katherine has other ideas. Meanwhile Abe is disgruntled after Lily refuses to help him with his homework - she's more interested in her date with Cain. Maddy has her hands full preparing for the arrival of the new baby and tells Abe that it's time he grew up and took some responsibility for himself. A dejected Abe goes to Eve for help. As Eve completes his homework, Abe wonders aloud what's so special about babies - why do they get everyone's attention? After researching human child-rearing, Eve cites 'helplessness' as the main reason. Inspired, a scheming Abe fakes being ill to regain Maddy's attention, but his plan backfires. Suspecting Abe has appendicitis a concerned Maddy calls an ambulance! Once again Abe begs Eve for help and so Eve hacks the local traffic control system, gridlocking the roads and preventing the emergency services from getting through. The situation escalates when Maddy unexpectedly goes into labour. With the roads blocked, Abe must man-up and help his mum - while Eve goes for help. Across town Will crashes Lily's date revealing that Cain is a fully paid up member of anti-tech group PRICE. At Calimov, under Katherine's interrogation, KT reveals how Will ended the childbot siege using his nanobots. Katherine now has the leverage she needs to persuade Nick to keep KT online. At the Watsons', Eve and the gang return with help - to find Abe has successfully delivered his baby brother!.(n)

programme.title: Eve
programme.desc: For the umpteenth time Eve defeats her friends at gaming, singing a football chant in triumph. Eve explains how, in a matter of nanoseconds, her predictive software allows her to always choose the best possible course of action - hence the winning streak. But it cannot predict random events like lottery numbers, much to Abe's disappointment. Unknown to the gang, Cain waits outside with Michael Hoffman, the son of the late Lord Hoffman. In their attempts to find rogue robots, Cain pitches his theory that - given the multiple incidents involving robot activity at the Clarke house, plus Nick's prior history with Mary Douglas - this is a good place to start. When the doorbell rings, Eve answers to find Cain and Michael. Detecting their concealed EMPs, she slams the door on them. Spooked by this odd behaviour they break in, fearful that there may be another robot siege in progress. Once inside they learn that Eve is the robot and blast her with their EMPs - only for time to rewind. This has simply been a simulation in Eve's predictive software! Eve runs multiple simulations trying to find a way to stop Cain and Michael discovering her robot nature, but in each one her identity is exposed and Cain and Michael destroy her. With time running out, Eve recruits the Will and Lily simulations. Lily speculates that Eve is experiencing anxiety. She has become so human, that it has caused her predictive software to malfunction. Eve must disable the software and go it alone. Although Eve manages to evade discovery, neither she nor the gang realise that, while inside, Cain has bugged Nick's computer and is one step closer to the truth.(n)

programme.title: Eve
programme.desc: Mary resorts to extreme measures to head off the threat of Cain and PRICE, enlisting KT to help her temporarily transfer her consciousness to Eve. With KT AWOL from Calimov, a distracted Nick and Katherine welcome back Zac, who is helping them answer questions about how Mary was able to duplicate his personality. Excited about Zac's return, Eve suggests he join the gang's picnic that afternoon. To everyone's surprise Zac brings his new girlfriend, and for the first time Eve experiences jealousy. Spotting KT hovering nearby puts Eve on high alert. Operating under Protocol Zero, KT is Mary's automaton, and is primed to execute her mother's plan. Meanwhile, on Abe's misguided advice, Eve kisses Will in an attempt to make Zac jealous. For a moment, in robot communion, Will sees inside Eve's mind and then passes out. In the ensuing chaos, KT places a magnetic patch containing Mary's consciousness onto Eve. Inhabiting Eve's robot body, Mary begins to question Cain about PRICE. Separately, a revived Will tells Lily that when he kissed Eve he could see inside her systems. They theorise that this made her malfunction and fixate on the idea of jealousy - perhaps she is attempting to make Zac jealous by paying Cain so much attention? Little do they realise the truth. Later, Eve - still possessed by Mary - meets Cain in the park, where she interrogates him about PRICE's super-EMP. Mary decides that Cain must be terminated. Will intervenes in the nick of time, kissing Eve again. The disruption to her circuits forces Mary to relinquish control, but Will hears Mary's voice in Eve's mind. The gang are left with a burning question - could Mary be alive?.(n)

programme.title: Eve
programme.desc: Eve tries to prevent a war between humans and robots, and Will struggles to control his nanobots and his feelings for Lily.(n)

programme.title: Eve
programme.desc: Will struggles to control his nanobots, and Mary plots revenge from beyond the grave.(n)

programme.title: Lost & Found Music Studios
programme.desc: Part two of two. The girls have trouble adjusting to their new band member, and Maggie sees a chance to reclaim her spot. Meanwhile, the boys hit a problem on the way to their gig.(n)

programme.title: Show Me What You're Made Of
programme.desc: In episode five of Show Me What You're Made Of it's their last factory in Asia and our teens make their way to a fish canning plant on the Taiwanese coast. If they thought factory work would get any easier they were sadly wrong! Some of them find the fish smell overwhelming and are horrified to discover that one job is boxing up fish heads and guts after the choice meat has been canned. Can they face their worst nightmare? Will they be able to finally show their last factory boss that they can manage a day's work even they might not want to? As they finish up in Taiwan and fly home to the UK, will they be able to show their families that their incredible trip has really changed them? Show Me What You're Made Of is presented by Stacey Dooley.(n)

programme.title: Top Class

programme.title: Rank the Prank
programme.desc: RANK THE PRANK - pranking Hollywood style! Today our pesky pranksters are Dukafundis (Markus and Ellysa) and 'Very Intelligent Pranksters' (Evan and Ashazia) who team up with digital effects wizard Hassan Aziz and SFX specialists Marc Reichel and Andy Antoine to stage the biggest and best PUBLIC PRANKS on an unsuspecting public. The teams take over a bowling alley and it's all hands on deck to rig the hidden cameras and special effects required to bring our Pranksters' ideas to life. But which team will impress our prank-loving panel of 'Ranksters' to win the chance to stage a mind blowing MEGA PRANK on a 'target' of their choice? It's strike three for the targets when Markus and Ellysa's 'Haunted Alley' dukes it out with Evan and Ashazia's 'Hotdog Bowler'. Ranksters ... the choice is yours. For the winning team, the effectors have planned the ultimate MEGA PRANK at a car wash featuring a dirty car, a nervous driver and a meteor shower! Our 'target' may be able to avoid the meteor but will mom's car be able to do the same? One thing's for sure, this explosively entertaining mega prank strikes comedy gold!.(n)
